H0.text: In which country did Juan Domingo Peron seize power in 1943, become president, and resign in 1955. Argentina

H1.text: In which country did Juan Domingo Peron seize power in 1943, become president, and resign in 1955. Chile

H2.text: In which country did Juan Domingo Peron seize power in 1943, become president, and resign in 1955. Uruguay

H3.text: In which country did Juan Domingo Peron seize power in 1943, become president, and resign in 1955. Argie

A4.text: He was the 29th president of Argentina from 1946 to his overthrow in 1955.
